title: Market Craze: Merge Defense
description:
Market Craze was created during the Kolibri Game Jam 2022. The objective was to develop a small but highly polished prototype for a merge-style game. You play as a store owner, merging employees in an increasingly difficult tower defense-style setup to serve incoming customers with their requested items. While I didn’t contribute to the core gameplay this time, I take pride in the polish I brought to the experience. I animated objects using DoTween, added bounce effects when items hit walls, and handled all animations entirely through code to enhance visual feedback and responsiveness.

  • Polish and visual feedback design
  • Code-based animation using DoTween
  • Physics-inspired interaction effects
  • Year: 2022
  • Platform: Android
  • Engine: Unity
